rules: Rule1: If the show is funded, then the show is published
Rule2: Either the show is funded or the show is documented
Rule3: Whenever the show is documented, it follows that if the substance is approved, then should the substance be effective, fertilization of the plant leads to maturity of the plant
Rule4: If the plant is mature, then it is not the case that the show harvested the plant
Rule5: If the substance is tested, then the substance is effective
Rule6: Should the substance be contaminated, the substance is unsafe
Rule7: Provided that the substance is applied to the plant, it follows that if the substance is effective, then fertilization of the plant leads to maturity of the plant
Rule8: Either the substance is applied to the plant or the substance is analyzed
Rule9: If the substance is analyzed, then the substance is approved
Rule10: If it is not the case that testing the substance implies fertilization leads to maturity, then the substance is contaminated
Rule11: Whenever the show is not successful, the show harvested the plant
Rule12: Should the show not be successful, the plant was fertilized
facts: Fact2: It is not the case that the show was published
Fact3: The substance is not unsafe
